website_summaries.verdict: A value-pack of holiday cards with aesthetically pleasing rustic designs.
pros: Large pack of 48 cards sits at a low price point
Cards have a rustic look to them
Thick, sturdy paper and high-quality envelopes
cons: A few complaints of some missing envelopes

customer_reviews.title: Joyless cards
customer_reviews.text: If you are celebrating Festivus, these are perfect. It’s amazing how utterly lacking in beauty the cover images are. Totally blah. Bought these for tip giving but they don’t convey appreciation. Sending them back now that I bought some beautiful Papyrus cards for just a few pennies more.
customer_reviews.author: Artsfan

customer_reviews.title: Loved these!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoy writing handwritten cards to all of my employees every year for Christmas. These are great quality and look great for the price. I can go to the store and buy $5.00/piece name-brand... or a box of these for a huge cost savings. They both do the same job.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Soper

customer_reviews.title: Blown away
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in a pinch to avoid going back to the store and was amazed at the quality of them. Beautiful and almost as thick as card stock. People that commented on them were shocked I ordered them from Amazon. I will say they are blank on the inside so I did some writing but loved it once I started.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to have on hand for gift cards and such at Christmas. Also used for office gifts since there was a good mix of general holiday greetings (not all just Christmas). Very cute and the craft envelopes gave a nice touch!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly fast delivery!
customer_reviews.text: These are absolutely perfect!! I placed my order on November 30th, and it was at my door on December 2nd! Crazy fast shipping when it was supposed to be here in 5-8 days! The cards are beautiful, and even though the top card had a bent corner, I am still giving this five stars for all of the above! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: nice quality of cards; box not so much
customer_reviews.text: the box for the cards isnt put together well so its like you have to juggle putting the cards back into it before it just comes undone and you are playing pick up.
customer_reviews.author: aardvarkstail

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: Let's just say that I used all 48 cards and my hands and wrists were very sore afterward. I had a lot of Christmas cards to send. These cards are so great, pretty and amazing quality!
customer_reviews.author: Emily O'Malley

customer_reviews.title: Cute cards
customer_reviews.text: For the price these were super cute to send to loved ones at Christmas! Envelopes didn’t stick 100% of the time so we added stickers there
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Christmas cards
customer_reviews.text: Great little cards!! Blank inside, but cute patterns. The only reason I didn't get five stars is because I had to tape every envelope since it would not seal
customer_reviews.author: Supermom Becky

customer_reviews.title: Cute Holiday Cards
customer_reviews.text: Love the designs, they are perfect for the holiday season
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Blank inside
customer_reviews.text: Cards were cute, but I didn't pay attention to the fact that they are blank on the inside. Had to use writings from inside last years cards
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t realize the insides were blank
customer_reviews.text: I’m only giving 3stars because I didn’t realize that the cards were blank inside until I opened the box. Other than that, the outside of the cards are nice.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia R

customer_reviews.title: Nice cards for the money.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the artwork on the cards - but the paper stock is kinda cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Tricia

customer_reviews.title: SO CUTE
customer_reviews.text: They're smaller than I expected but so cute! I can't wait to send these out!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: These cards are incredibly cute and they were actually sturdier and higher quality than I expected for the price. Envelopes are sturdy and good too . No complaints, would order again!
customer_reviews.author: JulietOrnellas

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Loved the cards, very pretty & seasonal. The envelopes felt like a brown paper bag and were colored the same so that was the only complaint. Other than that loved them
customer_reviews.author: Raevyn Skye

customer_reviews.title: As pictured
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality and quantity. Easy breezy for Christmas at work & personal life
customer_reviews.author: Jessie allen

customer_reviews.title: As advertised
customer_reviews.text: Just what we were looking for for our holiday cards this year! Exactly as pictured :)
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Variety
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the variety of these Christmas and Holiday cards- I'd purchase again next season.
customer_reviews.author: W

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Pictures printed on the front were good but not your typical size of Christmas cards but they will work for me!
customer_reviews.author: Cara Hammonds

customer_reviews.title: Not  impressed
customer_reviews.text: First it's something a nothing store would send out. Second I didn't realize it was blank inside something I can't use because I have shaky hands and can't write.
customer_reviews.author: Christina DeCastro

customer_reviews.title: Adorable cards
customer_reviews.text: Very on trend Christmas cards with a traditional rustic feel. Brown kraft envelopes just seal the deal. Will buy again for next year.
customer_reviews.author: Sherri A. Quaca

customer_reviews.title: Only recieved 29 enevelops
customer_reviews.text: I began writing out Christmas cards today and realized half way that I recieved 48 cards but only 29 envelopes. Disappointed that I wont be able to mail all my Christmas cards today. Cards are nice heavy paper.
customer_reviews.author: ezra gotham

customer_reviews.title: Love Them!!!
customer_reviews.text: I really love the style of the cards as well as the packaging. Also, the envelopes are super cute.
customer_reviews.author: Jay Bend

customer_reviews.title: Card are blank
customer_reviews.text: Did not read this careful enough to realize that these cards are blank on the inside. Plus 3 envelopes were creased beyond use.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen Valentino

customer_reviews.title: SHORTED Envelopes!
customer_reviews.text: I was shorted 3 envelopes with this order! I NEEDED ALL 48 cards for my employees.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Personal use only
customer_reviews.text: They weren't very sturdy, and kinda looked like they were a little faded. But for personal use they worked.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Good choices and quality...
customer_reviews.text: Love these. Hate using the same card for everyone. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Schneider-Farm

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: They arrived earlier than expected and are well made cards.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Delk

customer_reviews.title: Great basic cards!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these to print my own greeting inside - know that they are blank. Cards are crisply colored and at a great price - less than $0.50 per card. Will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: audra

product_meta.title: 48-Pack Merry Christmas Holiday Greeting Card - Rustic Happy Holidays Xmas Cards in 6 Designs, Bulk Assorted Festive Winter Holiday Cards with Kraft Envelopes, 4 x 6 Inches
product_meta.description: Share the joys of the yuletide season with your friends, acquaintances, and loved ones. This bulk holiday greeting cards set will prepare you for all your card-sending needs! Cut the hassle of rushing to the store and overpaying for cards. This pack consists of 48 blank greeting cards to include your very own custom messages for corporate and personal use. Each card features one of 6 festive designs. Make a statement with these Christmas cards made of high-quality card stock that feels thick and sturdy. Each card measures at 4 x 6 inches and comes with corresponding envelopes. Ensure you have plenty of greeting cards on hand for when occasions arise.
feature_bullets: CHRISTMAS CARDS SET: 48 pack of Christmas holiday cards featuring 6 assorted Christmas designs to wish your friends, acquaintances, and loved ones a happy holiday. Designs include reindeer, truck with Christmas tree, rustic wood panels and more.
BLANK ON THE INSIDE: Contains 48 blank cards to include your custom messages for business and personal use.
SUPERIOR QUALITY: Each card is printed on high-quality 250 gsm paper card stock for elegance and extra durability.
STOCK UP: Ensure you have enough greeting cards on hand for when occasions arise.
DIMENSIONS: Each card measures 4 x 6 inches. Includes corresponding gummed v-flap envelopes.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars147 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
